item.title: No title
item.description: TextielMuseum asked Jongeriuslab to coach the designers of Studio Truly Truly and together develop new domestic products for by TextielMuseum. In this way, as an educational institution, we underline the importance of knowledge transfer to a new generation of design talent. One of the products resulting from the collaboration is this abstract, graphic plaid. To create the variety of textures in the fabric, the designers converted hand-knitting techniques into new stitches suitable for the TextielLab’s computer-controlled knitting machine. more information on by.textielmuseum.nl

item.title: Dutch designers create new plaids for By TextielMuseum

item.title: Remembering David Bowie's singular film career
item.description:
Remembering David Bowie's singular film career

In Nagisa Ôshima's 1983 British / Japanese co-production Merry Christmas Mr. Lawrence, there's a striking scene in which David Bowie, playing a prisoner of war in a World War II Japanese camp, saves the life of one of his fellow captives.
